doc:
Jeff Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff_Anderson 0 Jeffrey Allan Anderson (born April 21, 1970) is an American film actor, film director, and screenwriter best known for starring as Randal Graves in Clerks and Clerks II. In between, he has appeared in other Kevin Smith-directed films and has written, directed, and starred in Now You Know. Jeffrey_Allan_Anderson ( born April_21_,_1970 ) is an_American_film_actor , film_director , and screenwriter best_known for starring as Randal_Graves in Clerks and Clerks_II . In between , he has_appeared in other_Kevin_Smith-directed_films and has_written , directed , and starred in Now_You_Know .
